name: Cards of Prophecy
effect:
:instant: Reroll any [die](../dice.md).

— OR —

:instant: Set a :resource_die: or :treasure: on the side of your choice.
flavor_text: You meet a traveler who offers to let you draw a card form the strange deck. When you refuse, he draws one himself. He has a momentary look of surprise on his face, then vanishes with a pop, dropping the cards. You gather them, and leave.
